channel.description: Recent content in Privacies on Nishan's Blog

item.title: Gym Diary - Privacy Policy
item.description: This policy applies to all the information collected or submitted on “Gym Diary - Track Your Workout” apps for iOS platform. Ads, Analytics and Notifications We use Firebase as an analytics platform. This is so that we can collect any crash or bugs related to app and provide you a bug free, seamless experience. Analytics data do not contain any kind of personal information that can be used to identify you.
